description.narrative:
Established in 2002, Universtar Science & Technology (Shenzhen) Co. Ltd. (Universtar or the Company) is a leading provider of environment monitoring equipment and services in China. Its core operations include manufacturing equipment, managing data monitoring systems and providing environmental treatment services. The Companys clients include municipal and provincial governments as well as private sector industrial clients.
The Companys proposed US$180m investment plan spans 2010 and 2011, and will be used to support its business operations related to online monitoring equipment and services in China.

IFC's expected development impact resulting from a potential investment in Universtar includes: (i) Contribute to the development of the environment protection sector in China and assisting local governments achieve their short-and medium-term environment protection goals; (ii) Help China address key climate change challenges by financing a company that produces equipment that energy intensive industries and local governments can use to monitor their water and air emissions; and (iii) Provide a means for Chinese environment regulators to have reliable and consistent data so that it can monitor and prioritize environment performance and objectives.
